items.title: User Image Upload and Pin Creation
items.description: Allow users to upload images, add descriptions, and create pins that can be saved to boards.
acceptance_criteria: User can upload image files in common formats (JPEG, PNG) up to a defined size limit
User can add a title and description to each pin
Uploaded pins are visible in the user's profile and associated boards
non_functional: Image upload should complete within 3 seconds for files under 5MB
System should support at least 10,000 concurrent uploads

notes: The requirement is high-level and vague; assumed core functionality is similar to Pinterest's pin creation feature. Additional features like search, following, and recommendations are not yet specified.
